A+ Rating With BBB Insured WSIB.Members OSPMA ,CPMA
Pesticon the name of knowledge and experience. Pest control with a professional approach. Pesticon Pest Control is engaged in providing the pest control for Mice, Termites, Bed bugs, Cockroaches, Millipedes, Centipedes, Silverfish, Wasps, Carpet Beetles, Fleas and all kinds of ants. We have the proven track record of over 80000 satisfied customers. By using the integrated Pest Management approach we give money back guarantee. We are licensed in Fumigation, Termites, Structural extermination. Experience the difference. Business with Ethics. Service beyond expectation.

profile:
* Best Guarantees * 24 Hour Service * Free Estimates & Consultation * Skilled, Experienced Professionals * Environmentally Responsible Procedures * Services Designed Around Children and Pets * Respect for You, Your Home, Family, Possessions and Time * Discrete, Unmarked Service Vehicles * Licensed technicians who look for cause and prevention, as well as elimination - Welcome to Advantage Pest Control Inc. We service the Greater Toronto Area and all surrounding regions. Whether you are researching a particular pest like bed bugs, inquiring about service or looking for do-it-yourself assistance, don't hesitate to give us a call! Our specialists are on standby daily from 8 am to 9 pm!
Our specialties include ants, bed bugs, bees & wasps, beetles, birds, caterpillars, centipedes, cockroaches, earwigs, fleas, flies, lady-bugs, mice & rats, mites, mosquitoes, moths, silverfish, spiders, termites, wildlife removal, and more.
